lines.text:
[referring to a captured Japanese fishing boat]
I wouldn't put to sea on that old tub for all the oil in *Texas*!

[referring to a broken-down Japanese fishing boat]
They should have given it back to the *Japs*!

[to Major Lyon]
*I* think your "absurd, impractical, scheme" just might *work*!... so pick a team, the best you can find, and leave the brass hats to *me*!
